name: Swipecaster
description:
Please Play In Fullscreen Mode

Play as bunch of feline mages, where you have to defend yourself by casting runes! Connect the points to channel the four Primal Runes of Felinity - WOH, KYA, RAH and MEW and defeat the evil legion of verminmice. 

This game was made for SEA Game Jam 2020, under the theme Connections!
